counting.title: Counting
counting.desc: Learn to count and read/write numbers

ordering.title: Ordering Numbers
ordering.desc: Arrange numbers from least to greatest and vice versa

measurement.title: Measurement
measurement.desc: Measure and compare length, weight, and volume

dataPresentation.title: Data Presentation
dataPresentation.desc: Read and interpret tables, charts, and graphs

placeValue.title: Place Value
placeValue.desc: Learn the value of digits in each place, a crucial foundation of Singapore Math

mentalMath.title: Mental Math
mentalMath.desc: Techniques to break down numbers for easier calculation, making 10s and 100s with Mental Math

areaModel.title: Area Model Multiplication
areaModel.desc: Use area concepts to learn multiplication with the Singapore Math Area Model

numberBonds.title: Number Bonds
numberBonds.desc: Understand relationships between numbers, deeply grasp addition and subtraction structure (Singapore Math)

barModel.title: Bar Model Method
barModel.desc: Various problem types: part-whole, comparison, before-after, and real-life scenarios (Singapore Math)

addition.title: Addition
addition.desc: Practice basic addition, starting from simple numbers to multi-digit numbers

subtraction.title: Subtraction
subtraction.desc: Learn subtraction, develop reverse calculation thinking skills

multiplication.title: Multiplication
multiplication.desc: Enjoy multiplication, learn times tables through games and activities

division.title: Division
division.desc: Understand division, share and distribute numbers in a fun way

numberSeries.title: Number Series
numberSeries.desc: Discover number relationships, learn patterns and sequences

shapeSeries.title: Shape Series
shapeSeries.desc: Predict the next shape in repeating patterns, practice observation and sequence recognition skills

multiplicationTable.title: Multiplication Table
multiplicationTable.desc: Memorize times tables with colorful charts, learn systematically

time.title: Time
time.desc: Learn to read time, understand clocks and time management

lengthComparison.title: Length Comparison
lengthComparison.desc: Measure and compare sizes, learn various units of measurement

weighing.title: Weighing
weighing.desc: Learn to weigh objects, compare mass and weight

quickMath.title: Ruler Measurement
quickMath.desc: Practice measuring length with a ruler, learn unit conversions

sumGrid.title: 3x3 Sum Grid
sumGrid.desc: Practice addition in grids with missing spaces, learn sequential and step-by-step calculation

shapes.title: Shapes
shapes.desc: Memorize geometric shapes, learn properties of different shapes

fractions.title: Fractions
fractions.desc: Understand fractions, learn division and comparison

fractionShapes.title: Fraction Shapes
fractionShapes.desc: Practice fractions with various shapes: circles, triangles, flowers, stars, and more

flowerMath.title: Flower Math
flowerMath.desc: Practice addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division through beautiful flowers - learn times tables in a fun way

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.desc: Learn percentage calculations, understand decimal conversions

lengthComparisonAlt.title: Length Comparison
lengthComparisonAlt.desc: Compare object lengths, learn to sort and order

money.title: Money
money.desc: Learn to count money, give change, and solve buying and selling problems

wordProblems.title: Word Problems
wordProblems.desc: Practice solving real-life math word problems: length, weight, volume, and time
